We got back together after a couple months.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1100/speak Caroline "Soon after that, I found out I was pregnant. I... I didn't have any reason to believe it wasn't Pierre's.$2#$b#I never told Pierre I saw someone else, so he had no reason to suspect Abigail wasn't his.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Caroline "Ever since Abigail dyed her hair purple several years ago, it's never faded. I thought that was very strange...$2#$b#Now my daughter is seeing magical creatures in the forest and taking an interest in fighting monsters...$2#$b#There's only one explanation. Abigail isn't my husband's daughter. She's Rasomodia's.$2"/emote farmer 8/pause 550/speak Caroline "I know it sounds unbelievable...$2#$b#But we used to dance together under the moonlight... and she often sang while we did...$2#b#I never understood the words and I don't think she did at the time either...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 550/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I hadn't spoken to Melusina in so many years. What we had was a long, long time ago. She was surprised to find me at her doorstep.$2#$b#I told her about Abigail, and that she might her daughter. She said she had a feeling one of the residents here in Stardew Valley had a connection to her.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "I... I cried so much. I felt horrible she was just now finding out she was a father.$2#$b#She brewed me some kind of potion to calm me down and explained what Junimos were, and why she is able to see them.$2#$b#She comforted me and gave me some advice.$2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I still don't know what I'm going to tell Pierre, or if I should tell him anything at all. And then there's Abigail...$2#$b#Melusina told me it's up to me to decide if she should know.$2#$b#I appreciate she isn't forcing me to say anything, or demanding I let her have a relationship with Abigail. I... I feel horrible and guilty.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "I will tell my family, but not now. In the meantime, you MUST not tell anyone about this, @. Please...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm sorry you're going through all of this.#I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail - they have a right to know."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#I TRUSTED YOU! YOU ARE THE WORST!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "I see you haven't told Pierre and Abigail yet, so what are you waiting for exactly, @?$3#$e#%Caroline is ignoring you."

Entries.Introduction: Um... Greetings! My name is Morgan. I'm a pupil of Melusina's. What's your name?$0#$e#It's been a pleasure!$1
Entries.spring_12: Melusina and I are traveling deep into the forest tomorrow.$1#$b#I won't be attending the town festival.$0#$e#She found a place with a really high concentration of raw magic. I'm excited!$3
Entries.Mon4: Melusina is teaching me about the magical properties of mystical ancient plants.$3#$e#She tells me the valley used to be full of them a long time ago.$1
Entries.Tue2: I have an exam soon. I'm ready to pass it!$1#$e#I want to protect people.$1
Entries.Thu: Do you like my hat?$1#$e#Melusina made it for me!$3
Entries.Thu2: Melusina told me there's forest sprites deep in the woods.$1#$b#Their magical powers are intertwined with the valley.$3
Entries.Sun4: Melusina is showing me a place called 'Sprite Spring'. She's gonna introduce me her forest sprite friends.$1#$e#One of them goes by 'Claus'. He gave her the ancient seeds for her arcane studies.$1
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm going on a special quest to gather something called 'fiddlehead' in the forest.$1#$b#Melusina needs it for a potion.$3
Entries.summer_Tue: Sometimes I ask Melusina if Vincent or Jas can come visit.$1#$e#She always says no....$2
Entries.summer_Wed8: I'm going on a field trip tomorrow!$3#$e#I asked if you could come but Melusina said no.$0
Entries.summer_Thu: *yawn*...$3#$b#I didn't sleep much last night.$0#$e#Why? I was practicing magic!$1#$e#Don't tell Melusina!$5
Entries.fall_15: Welwick is running her clairvoyance booth tomorrow.$1#$e#Melusina says she's really powerful.$0
Entries.fall_Mon: Did you know someone named Melusina Rasmodius built the tower on a 'magical field'?$0#$e#I wonder who he is...$3
Entries.fall_Fri: Melusina is teaching me the 'Merlin Doctrine'. It's like a big rulebook for mages.$0#$e#It's reeeeeally boring.$2
Entries.fall_Sat6: There's a blocked warp with the sign scratched off in the warp hall. I wonder what it was?$0#$b#Melusina forbids me from asking about it. But She'll tell me someday.$4
Entries.fall_Sun: I want to try fire magic but I'm not allowed to.$8#$e#Melusina says it's very hard to control.$0
Entries.winter_7: The area where the ice fishing festival takes place has a great mana pool too.$1#$e#Um. Melusina and I will be nearby. Try to find us!$1
Entries.winter_Tue: Since it's freezing outside, I'm gonna convince Melusina to let me try fire magic.$1#$e#Hmm, you're right. I guess it could be dangerous.$2
Entries.winter_Thu: I've asked Melusina about adopting an animal from Marnie's. She said 'maybe'!$3
